## KeywordFieldDefinition type

Represents a Keyword field definition (in a Schema).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type KeywordFieldDefinition = ItemPublishableFieldDefinition & {
    AllowAutoClassification?: boolean;
    Category?: Link;
    DefaultValue?: Link;
    List?: ListDefinition;
};
```
